Name: Balroc
Title: The Feral Warbeast
Description: Balroc, a mighty orc, embraces the role of a strength-based tank, his imposing presence and raw power making him the frontline bulwark in battles.

Name: Bane
Title: The Chaotic Blademaster
Description: Bane, a demon of formidable might, wields the dual essence of agility and magic as an unparalleled Brawler. With an infernal prowess, he thrives on the chaotic fusion of martial skills and arcane mastery, striking fear into the hearts of his foes.

Name: Xylla
Title: The Arcane Strategist
Description: A strategic sorceress, Xylla commands the arcane with grace. Her keen intellect and mastery of control magic make her a formidable leader on the battlefield.

Name: Thorn
Title: The Granite Guardian
Description: Thorn, a dwarf of indomitable strength, combines agility and tanking prowess. His unyielding resilience and skilled combat techniques make him a stalwart force on the front lines.

Name: Jeffray
Title: Binary Support Specialist
Description: A sentient machine designed for support, Jeffray excels at intelligence-based tactics. His precision and technological prowess make him an invaluable asset from a distance.

Name: Ence
Title: The Agile Sniper
Description: Ence, a swift and agile warrior, excels in marksmanship. His precision with ranged weapons and agility in combat make him a deadly force from a distance.
